scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Lisa
scrape.text: 4.5 starsI can't say I loved this book because that would be weird but I found it thoroughly compelling and I can't stop thinking about it!The narrator is a very intense person which makes for an uncomfortable but insightful reading experience.Two couples meet up to discuss an incident that has occurred concerning their children and the story is revealed by our narrator during each dinner course that leads to the final shocking conclusion.I love the way this is written and really enjoyed the story despite the distressing nature of it.
